name: JOSEPH TERRANOVA
text: Great pizza .order on line get a medium one topping pizza free with a large pizza  order

name: Jay Carter
text: Pizza arrived late and cold, no Cajun crust which we ordered.  Wings were drenched in sauce...we didn‚Äôt receive our pizza sauce yet we gave a 30% tip!

name: Sandra Filgo
text: I don't know what happened to this place but I'm done.  When I first moved here it was amazing. I loved the staff and I wouldn't go anywhere else for pizza.  Now I won't go back again.  The staff at the store can't even be bothered to say ‚Ä¶More

name: patrick bradley
text: Fantastic pizza, ate here for years.

name: Joe Miller
text: Hit or miss at this place.  Depends who is making the pizza. Average.

name: Michael Roome
text: I called to order a pizza and have it delivered. They would not deliver because they told me they were closed when they were NOT!

name: Elizabeth Ellen
text: Ordered delivery and the pizza was exceptionally delicious this time! The ordering process was smooth and fast. Will be ordering again!

name: RatTastic Boutique
text: I LOVE hungry Howies. Their pizza is always fresh and exactly how I love it

name: Matt Hunyady
text: Friendly and accommodating

name: Tammie Slate
text: Good food

name: Helen Rusaw
text: Excellent boneless bbq wings!  Wish the app applied the specials...ordered 20, but to get the special I needed to order 2x10.  The manager hooked me up, but with today's technology you'd think that would be automatic.

name: Kristy Farrell
text: Too expensive, bread sticks and salad were 16.00

name: Misty G
text: so much better than dominos, very nice delivery people

name: J. M. S. S.
text: I order here every once in a while. I'm not a fan, has gone down hill. Just got that new cookie pizza, gross, sooo under baked I had to re-bake it more at home. And the pizza I ordered, crusted was burnt and black. I'd rather have the pizza under baked and the cookie more crispy. Will be the last time I get pizza for myself.

name: Ace Boogie
text: Always good food from this location. Cant say the same about the rest

name: Sally Hawk
text: Best pizza in Holly

name: Must Belee
text: Delivery is always quick and the drivers are always nice.  Pizza could be of better quality with thicker crust and enough sauce to tell there is some... Salads are always fresh, never wilted Lettuce! I would order more often but the price you pay for the thin no sauce pizza makes me go elsewhere if I'm not in a hurry to eat..

name: William Johnson
text: We have had the subs, pizza, and wings for over 8 years everything has been awesome and always a helpful friendly staff!

name: Maria_Plays
text: I love there pizza

name: george baker
text: For the best pizza around ...Go Here

name: Don Prescott
text: Really good pizza  ! The best I have had in a long time!

name: Laura Marie
text: Very fast never get it wrong

name: Scott Bennett
text: Very nice staff, perfectly made pizza! Ohhh and super delicious!!!

name: James Hall
text: My pizza was so good, my order was ready on time, my salad was delicious and the flavor crust on my pizza! I will be back to this location the grand Blanc store!!üòÄüòÄ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

name: mr integrity
text: Good food good service

name: Jeff Wampler
text: Best pizza ever!  Go to the deals page and get a 5 dollar small pizza with 2 toppings.  You can add as many flavored crusts as you want also.  Try asiago, garlic, butter, ranch, and onion together.  You are welcome!

name: Lisa Carter
text: Love their Cajun crust!  They have a lot of good flavors of crust and awesome pizza choices.  They deliver fast and the drivers are friendly.

name: Ryan Lucas
text: Fast and friendly service. Girl behind counter has a nice butt. Stuffed crust is good

name: Kim Hartman
text: my pizza was to hard to eat.

name: Michael Miller
text: Very friendly staff, great customer service. Were accommodating when weather issue delayed our event. Postponed order to next day and they were ready right on time.

name: Spikerspeed
text: Our local Hungry Howie's, order was perfect food was hot and tasted great. Staff was very friendly and welcoming

name: Jason Alexander
text: Always will be my favorite pizza place

name: Kassandra O'shaughnessy
text: Got 2 oven baked subs and the bread was over cooked and breaking off. The people seemed friendly though...

name: M Bass
text: Sometimes the pizza is great and sometimes it's ok.

name: Michael Steimle
text: Great pizza.  Great price.  Delivery driver delivered within 15 minutes.  Amazing!

name: John Chalawich
text: I typically never give chain establishments a 5-star rating. But this location does the job and does it well food is consistent and is good quality

name: Derek Foster
text: This once again was a terrible experience. A salad made with just chunky lettuce bad cucumbers madebwith many easy fixes. The pizza was burnt and cheese bread was just fowl. This happens a lot here and they ask you to not go to corporate and force you to use any coupon they might give you.

name: Kaylene Bordeau
text: It was super fast delivery today

name: Chris H
text: Gross.  Pizza had no cheese and watery sauce.

name: Desiree Grice
text: Good pizza, fast service

name: amy wilhelme
text: Best place ever

name: Piron Lambert
text: Huge Howie's fan. We order often. Love! Love! Love! The philly cheesesteak pizza. Definitely will order it again

name: jeffery cottrell
text: Great food and pizza the way you order .

name: Gene
text: I love that they have an app I can use to order online!

name: Hjolsnfihr Wymahn
text: Awesome service, awesome food.

name: Matthew Akuna
text: Just love this pizza spot.  Sometimes there the pizza is a bit off its game, but hasn't stopped me from coming here for years.

name: Kaitlin Travelbee
text: We just moved to the Holly Area this is by far the fastest and most friendly Howies we have experienced!!

name: Trey Cottrell
text: Great food nice staff. A must go place

name: Sammy Bellman
text: I just love the food, but the guy that answered the phone (named Gary) was VERY rude.... and I did not know it but when they deliver they can't break a $50.... So guess I can't get my pizza because I only have a $50. I'll just call Cottage Inn!

name: Sarah Marie
text: PEOPLE WITH ALLERGIES BEWARE!!! This is by far the worst hungry howies, customer service wise, out there. They have messed up my order pretty bad in the past, but against my better judgement, I went back about 8 months later. My husband has ‚Ä¶More

name: Lisa Treece
text: Called to place an order and the guy who answered the phone, Jacob, was pretty rude. He answered the phone like a zombie and when I asked if they could swap out the regular sauce for their buffalo sauce on a junior pizza, he snarked, "Uh- ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Giza
text:
Wonderful place. Very consist ant. Very good management. I had one problem with a bad pizza and no questions asked gave me another gratis.
For fast food pizza its the best I have had. If I'm in flint or swartz creek ‚Ä¶More

name: Hal Felch
text: Friendly and fast... need to make sure they don't burn your pizza though.

name: C C
text: Consistent product. Easy online ordering.

name: William Crawford
text: Literally one if the best in the state. I never once been let down or have I ever seen a mistake.

name: JM
text: Clean. Fast. Friendly

name: J Hudson
text: Quick food.  Poor customer service.

name: Travis Holmes
text: Ok food

name: M -Redacted-
text: What do you expect, it is a cheap pizza shop.

name: Douglas Wilhoite
text: Very nice and courteous.

name: Krystal Hascall
text: Always a go to for great pizza

name: Mark Wolgamott
text: Great place for pizza

name: Connie Piascik
text: Good food fast

name: Mrs D
text: Neutral

text: Fast and friendly!
